body:
Opened PR #970 for these additional requests. Some notes for @18epedersen:

Add a unique ID for the console-log option (in the action dropdown)
Add a unique ID for the show-heartbeat option (in the action dropdown)
Add a unique ID for the preference-experiment option (in the action dropdown)
Add a unique ID for the opt-out-study (in the action dropdown) in the new recipe page
Add a unique ID to the selected action on the clone recipe page
 - We can't use an ID for these due to the front end library we're using.
 - We _can_ use **classes** instead - e.g. instead of `#rf-console-log`, we can use `.rf-console-log`

Add a unique ID to the ok button on the view recipe page
 - This doesn't appear to exist
